Class PlottableData

java.lang.Object
ib.grapher.PlottableData
public class PlottableData extends Object
A class which stores a single set of plottable data.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private double
    a
     
    private boolean
    active
    Whether or not the data set is currently shown on the graph.
    private double
    b
     
    private Color
    colour
    The colour to plot this data in.
    private Series
    dataX
    The series to use for the X-axis.
    private Series
    dataY
    The series to use for the Y-axis.
    private Series
    errorBarsX
    The series to use for horizontal error bars.
    private Series
    errorBarsY
    The series to use for vertical error bars.
    private boolean
    linRegActive
    Whether or not a linear trendline should be calculated for this data.
    private PlottableDataMenu
    menu
    The menu this data set is linked to.
    private String
    name
    The name of the data set.
    private double
    r
    Pearson correlation coefficient.
    private boolean
    XAgainstY
    When true, linear regression minimizes horizontal distance, rather than vertical distance.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    doLinearRegression()
    Does linear regression on this data set, storing the results in a, b, and r.
    double
    getA()
    Gets the a-value, or slope, of the linear regression line of best fit for this object, in the form y=ax+b.

    getB()
    Gets the b-value, or y-intercept, of the linear regression line of best fit for this object, in the form y=ax+b.
